name: FPS Prototype (Pascal Lambert)
description:
This is a prototype of a FPS game made for class. My fourth project using Unity.

The game is played best with a keyboard and mouse. Defend your castle from the invading army of evil snowmen, use the turrets once available, replenish you health with the lunchboxes. WASD to move, click to shoot.

Made by:

  • Aaron Scott - Art
  • Jamie Javadi - UI/Scripting
  • Jamie Lloyd - UI/ Scripting
  • Pascal Lambert - @pascall2 - Level Design/Scripting
  • “Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com“
